detail_desc: LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastic at the hem and fastener at the front.
Shorter jacket in imitation suede with imitation leather details, a large pile collar with two tabs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired mesh bra with overlocked edges, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti straps. Wide elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
